component.name: EmptyState
component.description: Placeholder for empty views with icon cluster, title, description, and optional action.

useCases: Showing a friendly message when a list or table has no data
Onboarding prompts to guide users to create their first item
Search results pages with zero matches
Error recovery when content fails to load

commonPatterns.name: single-icon
commonPatterns.description: Simple empty state with one icon
commonPatterns.composition: <EmptyState title="No results found" description="Try adjusting your search or filters." icons={[SearchIcon]} />

commonPatterns.name: triple-icon-fan
commonPatterns.description: Animated fan of three icons on hover for visual interest
commonPatterns.composition: <EmptyState title="No projects yet" description="Create your first project to get started." icons={[FolderIcon, FileIcon, PlusIcon]} action={{ label: "Create Project", onClick: handleCreate }} />

commonPatterns.name: no-icon
commonPatterns.composition: <EmptyState title="Nothing here" description="This section is empty." />

commonPatterns.name: with-action
commonPatterns.description: Empty state with a call-to-action button
commonPatterns.composition: <EmptyState title="No invoices" description="Create an invoice to start tracking payments." icons={[ReceiptIcon]} action={{ label: "New Invoice", onClick: handleNew }} />

antiPatterns.reason: The component supports exactly 1 or 3 icons for the fan animation

antiPatterns.scenario: Using EmptyState as a general card or container
antiPatterns.reason: It is specifically designed for zero-data states with dashed border styling
antiPatterns.alternative: Use Card for general content containers

antiPatterns.reason: It should only appear when there is truly no data to show
antiPatterns.alternative: Conditionally render EmptyState only when data array is empty

iconCount.description: Pass 0, 1, or 3 Lucide icons. With 3 icons a fan animation plays on hover.

slots.icons: Array of 0, 1, or 3 LucideIcon components for the icon cluster
slots.action: Object with label (string) and onClick (function) to render a primary action button

parentConstraints: Max width 620px; center within parent container

interactions.hover: Background shifts to muted; border opacity changes; with 3 icons the outer icons fan outward and all lift slightly
interactions.action-click: Executes the provided onClick handler via the primary button

responsive.mobile: Full width within container; generous padding maintained

accessibility.keyboardSupport: Tab to action button; Enter/Space to activate
accessibility.screenReader: Title and description announce the empty state; action button is focusable
accessibility.focusManagement: Focus targets the action button when present

rules: Always provide both title and description
Only display when data is truly empty — conditionally render
Action button uses primary variant and sm size
Icons must be Lucide icon components passed as array elements

aiHints.context: Use EmptyState when a view has no data to display. It provides a polished zero-state experience with optional icon cluster (supports 1 or 3 icons with hover fan animation) and a call-to-action button. Ideal inside DataTable empty states, empty tab panels, or empty page sections.
